name: Fresh Tomatillo Salsa
keywords: cilantro, jalapeño, gluten-free, low-fat, vegan, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 pound (about 9) tomatillos, husks removed, rinsed and quartered
1 cup lightly packed fresh cilantro stems and leaves

recipeInstructions.text: Taste a bit of a jalapeño to check heat level. If it seems too mild, use 3 peppers.
Combine all ingredients plus 2 tablespoons water in a blender. Pulse a few times before blending into a purée. Add a bit more water if needed: the salsa should be pourable. Serve.
